availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Wilkinson (Trigg County Court Judge and attorney)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, judge and attorney. Tennessee native. Married to Joyce Tillotson Wilkinson. Father of Cornelia Wilkinson McNichols. Attorney in Trigg County in 1860. Judge of Trigg County Court in Trigg County in 1864 and 1870.

ab.bibl: William Henry Perrin, ed., Counties of Christian and Trigg, Kentucky. Historical and Biographical (Chicago, IL: F. A. Battey Publishing Company, 1884), p. 31-32, 56, 227. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Cadiz, p. 194. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Cadiz, p. 2. KYR-0001-004-1313.
